00035 #include "ScalarMultiplyQualityMetric.hpp"
00036 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00037 #include "Matrix3D.hpp"
00038 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00039 
00040 using namespace Mesquite;
00041 
00042 std::string ScalarMultiplyQualityMetric::get_name() const
00043 {
00044   return std::string("Scale(") + mMetric->get_name() + ")";
00045 }
00046 
00047 void ScalarMultiplyQualityMetric::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00048                                               std::vector<size_t>& handles, 
00049                                               bool free_vertices_only,
00050                                               MsqError& err )
00051 { 
00052   mMetric->get_evaluations( pd, handles, free_vertices_only, err );
00053   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool ScalarMultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd, size_t handle, double& value, MsqError& err )
00057 {
00058   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate( pd, handle, value, err );
00059   value *= mScale;
00060   return rval;
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool ScalarMultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00064                                                     size_t handle,
00065                                                     double& value,
00066                                                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00067                                                     MsqError& err )
00068 {
00069   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value, indices, err );
00070   value *= mScale;
00071   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool ScalarMultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00075                                                    size_t handle,
00076                                                    double& value,
00077                                                    std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00078                                                    std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00079                                                    MsqError& err )
00080 {
00081   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, err );
00082   value *= mScale;
00083   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = gradient.begin();
00084        i != gradient.end(); ++i)
00085     *i *= mScale;
00086   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00087 }
00088   
00089   
00090 bool ScalarMultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00091                                                   size_t handle,
00092                                                   double& value,
00093                                                   std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00094                                                   std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00095                                                   std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00096                                                   MsqError& err )
00097 {
00098   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, Hessian, err );
00099   value *= mScale;
00100   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = gradient.begin();
00101        i != gradient.end(); ++i)
00102     *i *= mScale;
00103   for (std::vector<Matrix3D>::iterator j = Hessian.begin();
00104        j != Hessian.end(); ++j)
00105     *j *= mScale;
00106   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00107 }
